text:
Today's #bannedbooksweek YA title is OUT OF DARKNESS by Ashley Hope Perez. Visit your local branch to find it and many other banned and challenged titles. 
#jmrlib #jmrl #bannedbooksweek #freedomtoread @americanlibraryassociation #americanlibraryassociation #intellectualfreedom #outofdarknessbook @ashleyhopeperez
#awardwinningbooks

More than 100 pages in and this is seriously one of the most engaging works of historical fiction I’ve ever read. 📚🌲🥀🧐 

#outofdarknessbook #outofdarkness #reading #historicalfiction #historicalfictionbooks #book #books #reading #bookworm #chicagopubliclibrary #texas #bannedbooks #challengedbooks

NEW EPISODE TEASER!
😞🙏🏼❤️😞🙏🏼❤️😞🙏🏼❤️😞🙏🏼❤️

In week’s episode 🎙 of #relationshipsandrevenue I interview @aprilgiauque, a Domestic Violence survivor (thriver). She gets #real and #raw about life in the midst of DV, how she got out, and turned her #pain 😭 into her #purpose! 🤗

April wrote two books, “Pinpoints of Light: Escaping the Abyss of Abuse” and “Out of Darkness: Find, Fuel, and Live in Your Light.” Links to purchase these are ⬇️

https://tinyurl.com/PinpointsofLight

https://tinyurl.com/OutOfDarknessATG 

Please tune in (episode drops ⬇️ tomorrow) and #share with as many people as possible.

#apriltribegiauque #pinpointsoflightbook #outofdarknessbook #domesticviolence #domesticviolenceawareness #dvam #podcast #relationshipsandrevenue #podcastlife #podcasting #podcaster #podcastproduction #podcastproducer #author #speaker #coach

NEW EPISODE DROPPED! ⬇️
😞❤️🙏🏼😞❤️🙏🏼😞❤️🙏🏼😞❤️🙏🏼

October is Domestic Violence Awareness Month (DVAM). Far too many people are affected by DV, including my guest and friend @aprilgiauque.

We dig deep into the epidemic of DV in the interview and April talks about very #real and #raw stuff! 

The great thing about April is that she’s not afraid 😱 to get in there and do what’s necessary to help people get out of DV - survive 😳, yes, but move on to #thrive! 😃🙌🏼❤️

Please listen and let me know your thoughts. Would love 💕 and appreciate a rating & review for the podcast!

https://tinyurl.com/RandR020

My book is live on Amazon Kindle 💗💗💗#publishedauthor #postpartumdepression #momlife #firsttimemom #bestseller #outofdarknessbook #outofdarkness #ifyoucandreamityoucandoit #blessed

DV HURTS & COSTS!!!
😞🙏🏼❤️😞🙏🏼❤️😞🙏🏼❤️😞🙏🏼❤️

My guest on this week’s #podcast, @aprilgiauque, shares some STAGGERING 😮 statistics on #domesticviolence - including how much money 💵 is LOST 😳 in the aftermath of DV! 

Listen 🎧 to this clip to better understand some of the effects of DV.
